name: Better Roblox.com
description: This enables a better look for Roblox. The creator was only 12 when he made this!
additional_info:
Light Mode Progress:
01/08/2020 - Started working on light mode. When I made the header and sidebar blue, the text was black. I made it white. I wonder how I'm going to make the glyphs white... I may just leave them black. When I made the sidebar text white, the Merchandise text didn't turn white!
01/09/2020 - Made the Roblox logo white, now how am I going to make the other glyphs white? Just figured it out! I am trying to make the Upgrade Now button white. I made the glyphs white but the glyphs didn't appear at all! I did fix it though.
01/10/2020 - I made the Upgrade Now button white! I think we I have full Light mode support!
03/04/2020 - Now we Don't. I am doing the glyphs to make them colored.
